ygData.subject: RE: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: *chuckle* I say whatever your doing is well enough. I come frmo the old days.....when Fennin Ro was new... It took my warrior until level 15 to get full
ygData.messageBody:
*chuckle* I say whatever your doing is well enough. I come frmo the old
days.....when Fennin Ro was new... It took my warrior until level 15 to get
full banded. That you even have 20 plat at level 10 is a ton compared to
where I was. That you actually have 70 at level 7 is insane.

Sorry, just ranting... The economy is so whacked....now I can make 150pp a
night easy... *sigh* I'm a little higher level that you, but still, whatever
your doing sounds fine to me.

-Leod

-----Original Message-----
From: Omeg Felligan [mailto:omeg_felligan@...]
Sent: November 08, 1999 6:04 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Making Plat


From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>

Ok, anyone have any ways to make plat with some amount of speed? I'm a
level 7(almost 8) Erudite Mage saving for a large item (Flowing Black Robe,
and other expensive stuff). I have about 70 Plat so far and was wondering
if anyone had a way of making plat other than "have your high lvl get it
then..." b/c I don't have any high levels on this server :).

Thanks,
Omeg
